name: Gambaran The Game
description:
Gambaran

Is An Old-School Fast Card Game With Number On It... Since The Card Has Random Number From 0-9... There Is So Much Ways To Play With "Gambaran"... And Even If You Want... You Can Make Your Own Rule To Play "Gambaran"... Like Me On This Game... :3.

You Can See (Maybe) Official Gameplay Of This Card Game On This Random Youtube Videos In Here.

But In Here... I Create My Own Rule (Since I Can't Slap Hard Enough Back Then. :3.) And It's Kinda Long To Explain How The Game Works In Here... So I Already Put In-Game Help To Make You Understand The Game... :3.

Well... The Point Is... This Is My Own Rule Of Playing "Gambaran"... :3. Give It A Shot... :3.
